# Learning outcome

In this chapter, students will learn to:

- Write scientific publications using R Markdown templates implemented in the [*rticles* ](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rticles/index.html) package.

At the moment, those template cover the following publishers/journals:

- Biometrics articles
- Elsevier journal submissions
- Frontiers articles
- MDPI journal submissions
- PeerJ articles
- PNAS articles
- Royal Society Open Science journal submissions
- Sage journal submissions
- Springer journal submissions
- The R Journal articles
- Taylor & Francis articles
